weekly_top_story.headline: FDA greenlights clinical trials for pig kidney transplants in humans after successful procedures at Mass General
weekly_top_story.summary: Following three successful pig kidney transplants into humans at Massachusetts General Hospital, the FDA has authorized expanded clinical trials, marking a major step toward addressing organ shortages.

stories.headline: Florida announces plan to end school vaccine mandates, sparking expert concerns
stories.summary: Florida's new policy to remove school vaccine mandates is expected to increase illnesses and hospitalizations, raising concerns among healthcare experts about potential public health risks.

stories.headline: Minnesota launches Center for Health Care Affordability task force to address rising costs
stories.summary: Minnesota has initiated a new task force focused on improving healthcare affordability, aiming to tackle rising medical costs and enhance access for residents.
